5 Briefly, genomic DNA was extracted from peripheral blood samples collected at baseline using standard methods. A total of 188 patients of the ParkWest cohort were characterized by whole exome sequencing and 5 nonsynonymous variants were detected (N370S, T369M, E326K, V460L, and Y135C) and confirmed by sequencing.
5 These variants were genotyped in all available samples using TaqMan single nucleotide polymorphism genotyping assay (Thermo Fisher Scientific).
